MAN.TITLE: event handler functions
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Prototype of functions which may be used as event handler.

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : window number where the event had occured.
: X coordinate in pixels of the mouse pointer when the events occured.
: Y coordinate in pixels of the mouse pointer when the events occured.
: number corresponding to the event type.

DESCRIPTION.P: When the event handler mode is enable, Scilab will call the specified event handler function each time an event occures in the graphic window. The event handler function must comply with the above prototype. Each time an event occured, the function is called and its four parameters are set accordingly to the window number, mouse position and type of event.
The ibut parameter takes one of the following value depending on event type:

ITEM.label: ibut==0
ITEM.SP: : Left mouse button has been pressed

ITEM.label: ibut==1
ITEM.SP: : Middle mouse button has been pressed

ITEM.label: ibut==2
ITEM.SP: : Right mouse button has been pressed

ITEM.label: ibut==3
ITEM.SP: : Left mouse button has been clicked

ITEM.label: ibut==4
ITEM.SP: : Middle mouse button has been clicked

ITEM.label: ibut==5
ITEM.SP: : Right mouse button has been clicked

ITEM.label: ibut==10
ITEM.SP: : Left mouse button has been double-clicked

ITEM.label: ibut==11
ITEM.SP: : Middle mouse button has been double-clicked

ITEM.label: ibut==12
ITEM.SP: : Right mouse button has been double-clicked

ITEM.label: ibut==-5
ITEM.SP: : Left mouse button has been released

ITEM.label: ibut==-4
ITEM.SP: : Middle mouse button has been released

ITEM.label: ibut==-3
ITEM.SP: : Right mouse button has been released

ITEM.label: ibut > =32
ITEM.SP: : key with ascii code ascii(ibut) has been pressed

ITEM.label: ibut < =-32
ITEM.SP: : key with ascii code ascii(-ibut) has been released

ITEM.label: ibut > =1000+32
ITEM.SP: : key with ascii code ascii(ibut-1000) has been pressed while CTRL key pressed

DESCRIPTION.P: See figure_properties or seteventhandler for information on how to specify the event_handler name.
